column4: In fact, I was using the Linux box to print to the printer on another machine just fine, but wanted to move my stuff to ubuntu to consolidate it as my server for everything.. seems my plan has backfired

On top of it, one of the Linux help docs for Ubuntu says about using Windows to be the print server "why would you want this  ?"  And that made me even more mad because I say "BECAUSE AT LEAST SHARING A PRINTER ON WINDOWS WORKS!"
below on this page, you find some business case studie, perhaps they can inspire you http://users.skynet.be/gbachot/html/business.html
